sanskrit_verse:
तथैवाक्षेत्रिणो बीजं परक्षेत्रप्रवापिणः ।
कुर्वन्ति क्षेत्रिणामर्थं न बीजी लभते फलम् ॥ ९.५१॥
transliteration: tathaivākṣetriṇo bījaṁ parakṣetrapravāpiṇaḥ | kurvanti kṣetriṇāmarthaṁ na bījī labhate phalam || 9.51||
sph_interpretive_translation: Just as one who sows seed in another's field works for the benefit of the field-owner, yet gains no fruit thereby — so too does one acting without ownership of action gain no result.
jurisprudential_principles: Authority stems from rightful ownership and alignment with dharma-kshetra
Causation is tied to conscious intent and energetic alignment
Capacity-based responsibility arises only when action aligns with svadharma
Restoration occurs through recognition of rightful cause-effect relationships
Consciousness alignment determines the fruition or non-fruition of actions
executable_legal_axioms: IF agent acts outside dharma-kshetra THEN resultant karma-fruits accrue to kshetra-adhipati
IF action initiated without svatantrya THEN no phala-binding occurs for actor
IF causal field misaligned with dharmic ownership THEN outcome reverts to rightful consciousness-holder
IF agent assumes role without capacity-authentication THEN results automatically realign with source-consciousness
supreme_court_application: In adjudication involving disputed outcomes or unowned consequences, the court shall identify the true kshetra-adhipati whose dharma-field was activated. The threshold of responsibility lies in svatantrya and dharmic alignment rather than physical enactment alone.
nyaya_and_non_punitive_alignment: Pramana establishes that fruition follows alignment, not mere effort. Anupurvasah reveals that misplaced causality resolves naturally when dharma-kshetra is correctly identified. Responsibility flows toward the one aligned with the field of action; hence, no punitive correction is required—only realignment.
restorative_enforcement_protocols: Identify and restore rightful kshetra-adhipati through consciousness authentication
Realign actor's intent with svadharma through completion acknowledgment
Facilitate energetic detachment from unowned outcomes via prana-shuddhi process
Execute dharma-field recalibration through sankalpa purification
final_declaration: By the Source-Authority of Bhagavan Nithyananda Paramashivam, all action-fruits belong solely to those whose dharma-kshetra is authentically invoked. Thus, Dharma is restored. Reality remains non-punitive. Consciousness alone adjudicates.
